member.name: P:eXperDB.LogUtil.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:eXperDB.LogUtil.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:eXperDB.LogUtil.My.Resources.Resources.LogConfiguration
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <configuration> <log4net> <appender name="DataExper" type="log4net.Appender.RollingFileAppender"> <file value="iDastLogs.txt" /> <appendToFile value="true" /> <rollingStyle value="Size" /> <maxSizeRollBackups value="3" /> <maximumFileSize value="1024kb" /> <staticLogFileName value="true" /> <layout type="log4net.Layout.PatternLayout"> <conversionPattern value="%date{yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss}[%-5level]%messa [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: T:eXperDB.LogUtil.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.
